alert.note: Alert for Bamberg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 16 at 1:59PM EDT until March 16 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM EDT FOR BAMBERG COUNTY... At 158 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bamberg, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Bamberg, Denmark, Ehrhardt, Govan and Bamberg County Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows. Report any hail, damaging winds or flooding directly to the Columbia National Weather Service at 803 234 4115 when it is safe to do so. You can also send reports by Facebook or Twitter to NWSColumbia or by e-mail at NWS.Columbia@noaa.gov.
